rs-slide.data-title: WE WANT U! Join Our Team

img.title: We Want You!
img.rs-layer: Be part of our network that's leading the way in supporting students from crew to college, and know your work makes an impact in the city every day.

div.p: University Prep Schools serves children in grades K-12 through experiential and individualized learning programs. All U Prep schools are state-of-the-art learning facilities located in the heart of Detroit.

There is a total of 10 U Prep schools that serves our students throughout three school districts; University Prep Academy (UPA), University Prep Science & Math (UPSM), University Prep Art & Design (UPAD).
To learn more about the U Prep experience and how we differ from other schools please call to schedule a tour or attend an open house.

h4.a: UPA Elementary School – Ellen Thompson Campus
UPA Elementary School – Mark Murray Campus

div.div: We exist to give students the courage to pursue a future full of possibilities.
